common.name: Terry Chan
common.me_paragraph: Born and raised in Paris, I did my studies in France and the US. Some of my friends say that I've had different lives because I traveled so much and had different career paths. Now, I'm onto a new adventure that is web development. That desire arose when I became a Bitcoin enthusiast and started to grasp the power of the Blockchain, which made me curious of coding. From there, I attended a +460 hours coding bootcamp for web development. I am now ready and eager to land my first job. Hopefully, you will be the one who will give me that opportunity. And you won't regret it!
common.bric_broc_subtitle: A website for toy rental services through a subscription.
common.bric_broc_description: This was the final project of my bootcamp where we worked with 4 UI/UX designers and I led the team of 3 developers.
common.la_cite_description: I redesigned the whole website from scratch to bring a dynamic and modern vibe.
common.resume_react_description: Creation of my resume through React to make it more interactive.
